basic.floral_language:
Crassula nudicaulis var herrei 
Floriography: self-reliant, pure, faithful
Green leaves of crescent shape, meaty. Leaf edge turns into dark brown or dark red color in abundant sun light. Grows fast with lateral branches, lovely look. 
Toelken likes sun, leaves turn green in lack of sun light. Occasionally produces white flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, blooms sometimes, with white small flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, with adequate sunlight, leaves edges turning to red brown

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Summer is its dormant period, use half shade for better care, spring and autumn are its growing seasons, need plenty of sunshine
maintenance.watering: Water 2 times during summer dormancy, 20ml water every time, keep soil moist in other time, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
